Posts.Content: Thank you just wish there was someone who had my type at recurrence but doesn’t seem there is. Mine doesn’t respond to anything not even chemo if last time is anything to go by but thank you for you good wishes think I am going to need them
Posts.Title: ER positive clear nodes grade 3 and waiting on oncotype results.....

Posts.Content: Hi I had grade 3 triple negative and wide local Incision to remove tumour no nodes. I had chemotherapy Radiotherapy. Lived through it came back this year had mastectomy to remove same type tumour and am just wondering if I should chemo or not chemoÂ  However I have friends who are doing well I was just lucky
